long_description: Ridiculously fun to ride whether zipping down groomers, floating through powder or throwing down frontside 180s, the Jones Mountain Twin snowboard is your ticket to all-mountain fun. Twin profile and blunt nose keep you floating while the mellow Magne-Traction locks in stability when the fresh tracks are gone. Mellow Magne-Traction improves edge grip by adding five contact points along the running length of the board, resulting in amazing control whether riding ice or pow. Camrock, a distinctive rocker/camber flex pattern, evenly balances tip and tail rocker and slight camber between the bindings. Full wood core is comfortable and robust; it's a true all-terrain core and certified by the Forest Stewardship Council; fiberglass enhances the flex and board feel. Carbon stringers improve pop and torsional stiffness, and increase the longevity of the flex profile. Film topsheet saves weight over traditional plastic topsheets; sintered base absorbs and retains wax; steel edges. P-tex waste is drastically reduced by flip-flopping base graphic colors between boards; base colors are random, thus specific requests cannot be accommodated. .
